title: Reactive Watchface for Wear
description: Reactive watchface with options for color accents. The companion app inside android wear lets you customize and preview.★ Battery and Date indicator ★ Weather Widget★ Red, Blue and Green color options★ Tick and sweep second hand★ Toggle battery and date widgets visibility ★ Ambient mode★ Live preview of settings on phone★ All settings can be changed on watchSupport for square (G Watch, Gear Live, ZenWatch etc.) and round (Moto 360, G Watch R etc.) displays.INSTALL NOTES:After installing the application, new styles of watches appear in the menu selection of watch faces in your Android Wear after 10-20 seconds. If you encounter problems with the installation of watch faces on Wear, please go to the android wear app -> Settings and "Resync apps".
descriptionHTML:
Reactive watchface with options for color accents. The companion app inside android wear lets you customize and preview.

★ Battery and Date indicator
★ Weather Widget
★ Red, Blue and Green color options
★ Tick and sweep second hand
★ Toggle battery and date widgets visibility
★ Ambient mode
★ Live preview of settings on phone
★ All settings can be changed on watch

Support for square (G Watch, Gear Live, ZenWatch etc.) and round (Moto 360, G Watch R etc.) displays.

INSTALL NOTES:

After installing the application, new styles of watches appear in the menu selection of watch faces in your Android Wear after 10-20 seconds. If you encounter problems with the installation of watch faces on Wear, please go to the android wear app -> Settings and "Resync apps".
